overview:
Josh Mendelsohn is the Director of Marketing at Invoke Solutions.

Josh brings seven years of experience in the marketing research industry to the Director of Marketing role. Prior to Invoke, he was at Chadwick Martin Baileyâ€”a Boston-based custom marketing research firm where he was in charge of marketing and played a central role in its business development efforts. A former president of the Boston chapter of the American Marketing Association, Josh has held a variety of marketing positions that include promotions, events, media, merchandising, and direct mail. Josh received his B.A. from Union College in Schenectady, NY.

Source: Invoke Solutions
